Pompano_Beach.Holy Cross Hospital (Fort Lauderdale):
Holy Cross Hospital is located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. The hospital is a non-profit, 557-bed Catholic hospital, which operates in the spirit of the Sisters of Mercy and a member of Trinity Health.
Founded in 1955, Holy Cross has received honors for its patient safety, orthopedics, urology, gynecology, women's health, geriatric, stroke care, heart failure, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and heart bypass surgery.
